A musical theater production featuring a cast of mice who are discovered by a human and trained to perform a variety of songs.
A children's book series that follows the adventures of a group of mice who use their singing talents to solve mysteries and outsmart their enemies.
A science fiction story where a group of genetically engineered mice are created with the ability to sing, and they must use their powers to escape from a secret government laboratory.
A historical fiction novel set in medieval Europe, where a troubadour mouse isored by a group of mice who have been trained to sing, and are used to entertain the wealthy elite.
A comedy web series where a group of mice who have been trained to sing,, and are rehearsing for a big performance, but their rehearsals are constantly disrupted by a group of mischievous rats.
